恍.definition: (bound form) in a hazy state of mind; (bound form) to snap out of that state; used in 恍如[huang3ru2] and 恍若[huang3ruo4]

恍如.definition: to be as if...; to be rather like...

恍如隔世.definition: like a thing of the previous generation; as if it were a lifetime ago

恍然大悟.definition: (idiom) to suddenly realize; to suddenly see the light

恍然醒悟.definition: a sudden realization; to realize sth in a flash

恍神.definition: to be off in another world; to suffer a lapse in concentration

恍若.definition: as if; as though; rather like

恍若隔世.definition: see 恍如隔世[huang3 ru2 ge2 shi4]
